name: particles less
description:
This is 'particles less', a new video game from Outhouse Media.
It's a competitive multiplayer game set in a futuristic, dystopian future where the only way to survive is to collect and sell a plethora of weapons, tech and collectibles. 1986 - NEW VIDEOGAME - 64K ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK - FUTURE WAR The Large Hadron Collider is a research facility, and full of unexpected nuclear devices. The Big Bang is the beginning of a new era for humanity: mankind extends into outer space, and there comes a day when all of humanity has the possibility of taking a leap out of Earth's orbit. In the early 80s - FUTURE WAR 1984-3333 - NEW VIDEOGAME - BLACK MASS The world of Black Mass is a sprawling dreamscape. There are no boundaries to what can be experienced, and it's a dangerous place for those who fall to the dark side. 1983 - NEW VIDEOGAME - JERRY Jerry is a smart, yet irresponsible young man | a graduate student in the robotics field. Jerry must work to become an 'engineer-in-training', while trying to navigate a world filled with a broken and dangerous robot army. 1984 - NEW VIDEOGAME - BABYLONIAN CHALLENGES In the year 2014, Earth is at the brink of becoming a black hole. Gassy bison roam the land, and trillions of stars around the galaxy are ripe for discovery. 1984
